text: to usake paravaradigaar ne (unakee nazr) mariyam ko khushee se kubool faramaaya aur usakee nasho va numa (paravarish) achchhee tarah kee aur zakariya ko unaka kafeel banaaya jab kisee vakt zaqariya unake paas (unake) ibaadat ke hujare mein jaate to mariyam ke paas kuchh na kuchh khaane ko maujood paate to poonchhate ki ai mariyam ye (khaana) tumhaare paas kaho se aaya hai to mariyam ye kah detee thee ki yah khuda ke yaho se (aaya) hai beshak khuda jisako chaahata hai behisaab rozee deta hai
